Tetum translation English translation Indonesian translation ğ„† PÃ¡tria, PÃ¡tria, TimÃ³r Lorosa'e, ita-nia Nasaun. GlÃ³ria ba Povu no ba ita-nia erÃ³is libertasaun nasionÃ¡l. ğ„‡ Ita manÃ¡n hasoru kolonializmu, ita hakilar: Hatuun imperializmu. Rai livre, Povu livre, Lae, lae, lae ba esplorasaun. BÃ¡ oin hamutuk, laran-metin no barani. Halo funu hasoru imperializmu Inimigu Povu hotu-hotu nian, toâ€™o vitÃ³ria finÃ¡l Liu dalan revolusaun. ğ„† Fatherland, fatherland, East Timor our Nation. Glory to the people and to the heroes of our liberation. ğ„‡ We vanquish colonialism, we cry: down with imperialism! Free land, free people, No, no, no to exploitation. Let us go forward, united, firm and determined In the struggle against imperialism, Enemy of the people, until final victory, Onward to revolution. ğ„† Tanah air, tanah air, Timor-Leste negara kita. Jaya pada rakyat dan pahlawan pembebasan kita. ğ„‡ Kita tundukkan penjajahan, kita berseru, "Hancurkan imperialisme!" Negeri merdeka, rakyat merdeka, tidak, tidak, tidak pada penindasan. Mari kita maju, bersatu, teguh, dan bertekad Dalam perjuangan menentang imperialisme, Musuh rakyat, hingga kemenangan akhir, Maju menuju revolusi. ==References== Category:Asian anthems Category:East Timor Category:Oceanian anthems
